alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:34PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Lewis and Clark County through 715 PM MDT... At 634 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Lincoln to 20 miles west of Helena. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lincoln, Wolf Creek, Marysville, Canyon Creek, Nilan Reservoir and Bean Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 212 and 230. Highway 200 between mile markers 66 and 104. Highway 287 between mile markers 1 and 4 . MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
